ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: It's a good chance for you to learn how to work on your pronunciation and presentation.
It is good, but for someone of humanities it is not likely to find the space to practice conversation using your field's topics.
ELP 515 02 is a great class to test and greatly improve your abilities in teaching in American English. Definitely recommended to all the non-native speakers.

Of course, I will be recommending the course to other students, since the course is very helpful for the students who want to become a TA or need to be a TA. Even it is very helpful for the people who hope to have an education career.
I would say it is very helpful for student who is not native english speaker.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Doing english presentations helped me to practice handling with complex concepts in english

Communicating in English is a key aspect for a successful research and course of studies. This class improved in many aspects my understanding of the language and of the areas that I shouldwork on the most. It will be extremely helpful for my future graduate school life

The course solves many many my questions on how to use English language and how to become a good teacher. In my future research, the above skills are obviously very important; thus, thanks so much for this course and the instructor.
